Minimum:

  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 960 2GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Game controller required. Wired or wireless Xbox first-party controller with rumble supported, as well as wired DualShock4 and DualSense controllers. Rumble and light bar supported on PlayStation controllers (only available when wired). Third-party wired controllers supported. Spirits' Creek renders at 1080P. If your monitor(s) render at a higher resolution and you experience some UI Scaling issues, please consider changing your screen's resolution for the duration of your playthrough.

Rumble and light bar supported on PlayStation controllers (only available when wired). Third-party wired controllers supported. Spirits' Creek renders at 1080P. If your monitor(s) render at a higher resolution and you experience some UI Scaling issues, please consider changing your screen's resolution for the duration of your playthrough.
